description: Erection of single-storey rear extension to replace existing;  alterations to fenestrations including replacement windows across rear elevation
decision_conditions: <p style="margin-left: 15px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">Full details, with&nbsp;samples, of the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the buildings, including bricks, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before any work on the site is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p style="margin-left: 15px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"><br></span></p><p style="margin-left: 15px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">REASON: To ensure the proposed development appears in keeping with the character of the area and does not detract from the original design of the host property.</span></p>

<p style="margin-left: 15px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><span id="m_5754406456546771804gmail-docs-internal-guid-c1aba47e-7fff-6520-9af0-ef57dd41b146"><span style="font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">All trees and planting within the site shall be retained unless shown on the approved drawings as being removed. Any trees that are removed as part of the development shall be replaced during the next planting season (October to March inclusive) with other trees or plants of a location, species and size to be first approved in writing by the local planning authority, and maintained in perpetuity thereafter. Any pruning works shall be carried out in accordance with BS 3998:2010 (or any standard that reproduces or replaces this standard). </span></span></span></p><p style="margin-left: 15px;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"><span id="m_5754406456546771804gmail-docs-internal-guid-c1aba47e-7fff-6520-9af0-ef57dd41b146"><span style="font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></span></span></p><p style="margin-left: 15px;"><span id="m_5754406456546771804gmail-docs-internal-guid-c1aba47e-7fff-6520-9af0-ef57dd41b146" style=""><span style="background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><font face="Arial"><span style="white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure the proposed development mitigates any significant or detrimental impact on the existing on-site trees.</span></font></span></span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">Details of the green roof, including cross-sectional drawings at a scale of 1:20 of the proposed green roof system confirming that the green roof is specified with a substrate base of at least 80mm, not including the proposed vegetative mat, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to the commencement of the relevant part of the development. The details shall be implemented and retained as approved. </span>Detailed specification of at least one other sustainable urban drainage system (i.e. water butt with overflow, raingarden, bioretention planter box, permeable paving etc.) shall also be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA.<br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-0aacf028-7fff-b34f-a8a0-aae11acfdc0e"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the proposed development provides adequate on-site biodiversity enhancements and ensures suitable mitigation against surface water flooding.</span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
